response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence, offering unparalleled benefits and features that cater to your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that promises to deliver significant value and satisfaction. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with an attractive deal. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
